website_summaries.verdict: Fast and exciting strategic gameplay makes Kingdom Rush Origins a must-have pick for tower-defense fans.
pros: Kingdom Rush Origins keeps the familiar gameplay of the original, but adds tons of new content and new ways to defend against wave after wave of enemies
cons: There are separate versions for iPhone and iPad

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying strategy game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game because it doesn't hold back. The variety of tower abilities, ways to play levels, heros, and enemies keeps the game interesting and challenging. I like all the choices players can make to customize the attacks. Very fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jonas' Dad

customer_reviews.title: Fantasy Combat Fun for All
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't play games that have elves and fairies in them, but I make an exception for this one as it's a solid tower defense style game that's surprisingly captivating with lots of options and upgrades possible to keep things interesting. A round can last fifteen minutes or so, making it a great time-killer. Easy to learn and gameplay is challenging but it can be won, with three levels of difficulty. The game plays smoothly and well on my Kindle Fire HD. The original game in the series is still free if you want a sampling, but this more highly refined version offers bang for your buck, and it's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Fyrefox

customer_reviews.title: Very fun (and addictive!) game!
customer_reviews.text: I'd never really tried a game like this before but I really enjoyed it. (I usually play time management games and I loved Plants vs. Zombies.) I tried this one first and then went on to play the other two Rush games and liked them all. I don't really think the order you play them in matters much. They have a little humor and require a little speed and strategy to complete each level. I finished all the games with the base characters so that was a pleasant surprise. Works well on Gen 2 and 4 Kindle Fires. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauradar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tower defense. It's amazing how they keep improving from their previous titles which were already incredible
customer_reviews.author: Caroline S.

customer_reviews.title: A highly addictive strategy game that is more "mythically Medieval" than the first!
customer_reviews.text: I like Origins much more than I liked Kingdom Rush (though both games are very fun and addicting), and I can't quite put my finger on why. I think maybe the feel of it, being a tad more mythically Medieval (focusing on Elves and all) really drew me in. The levels look more like they belong in Middle Earth, and are very pleasing to look at. I also feel like this one was a bit more challenging than the first (although it has been a while since I played the first one). Either way, of the two of them, this is the one I find myself going back to time and time again.
customer_reviews.author: Kieva

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: Im a tower defense game kinda guy. I'm not one to say a game is the best after a few plays but this is definitely in that caliber. There is so much depth to this game. It does have some in game purchase options but it has so much playability without them. If you're looking to get wrapped up in a good game, look no further as this one is addictive. Ive played the original kingdom rush and this has much more to offer plus the basics. Dont hesitate, start playing now and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Albert Murray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. I am a console gamer and I generally don't like mobile games but this game is the exception. It's fun, smart, and charming. If you are a fan of tower defense get these games. That being said I feel like there is a lot of wasted replay value when it comes to the hero's. Most of them have to be bought with real money instead of unlocking. I feel like instead of paying for it you could unlock them in a series of harder and harder challenges. You only get about 5 free hero's out the whole gallery. Something to think about for the next installment developers.
customer_reviews.author: PublishedSorrow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tower Defense Game
customer_reviews.text: All the Kingdom Rush games are great little tower defense games. The levels are addictive, offer enough options to keep you going, and the bosses and attack strategies of enemies are varied enough to throw some surprises at you (often causing you to replay levels until you figure out the right way to tackle new enemies at veteran level+). I highly recommend it. The one down side to this game (if you are familiar with previous games), is that it is a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: Stackupguitar

customer_reviews.title: The best tower defense out there.
customer_reviews.text: I have played every game put out by ironhide studios and none of them have disappointed. The gameplay is smooth and lag free. The plotline is interesting and the heroes are cool. There are options to buy other heroes but the ones you start out with are good to play with too! This game is a must have and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: David Michael

customer_reviews.title: TO COOL!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT GAME! Not as much game play as the second game. (maybe that's just me) But deffently worth the money! I recommend to anyone who likes the TD genre and a fan of the first two kingdom rush games. Its just...idk...ITS JUST SO AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.author: WolfGenius

customer_reviews.title: Amazon, Where is the Update????
customer_reviews.text: Origins is another great Kingdom Rush game from the fun guys at Ironhide Studios. It is on the easy side, so you get finished quickly. Which is where the update comes in. The update is already on other platforms. I started the game all over from the beginning on my phone just to get the update. So frustrating that you're behind on this, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wong

customer_reviews.title: really fun and challenging tower defence game
customer_reviews.text: This game is another gem from the studio that brought you other games like Kingdom Rush and Kingdom Rush Frontiers. Key features for a high score: - beautiful graphics - responsive controls - always challenging - hidden Easter eggs - does not bug you with in app purchases
customer_reviews.author: A. Bhagwat

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: The Kingdom Rush games are fun to play. I like that after a certain point, there are 2 endless wave campaigns where you can earn points to buy magic spells to help on other campaigns. It is probably easier to play on a 10" tablet so that you can view the layout better.
customer_reviews.author: rin

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best in its Genre!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and will keep you drawn, on those days where you ain't got s*** to do atm or this long car rides. Would have given it a 5 but there is just some minor things I am displeased with like how you can't stack soldiers after you send another two of email the previous ones disappear. The star system is all wrong... and how you can't buy the better hero's with the gold you earn from leveling your hero up.. your forced to buy them unfortunately... but other than the little things it's a flawless game practically... Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Wawrzynski

customer_reviews.title: Great game as always, Ironhide!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of the Kingdom Rush series ever since I played the first game on Onemorelevel.com, so when I heard that this game had come out, I bought it as soon as possible. And I must say that so far, I'm not disappointed. With addicting gameplay and a quirky sense of humor, this series stands among my favorites. However, I will say that the near-dependence on micro transactions isn't necessary; if you're going to make us grind for gems, at least explain what conditions are necessary to obtain them easily, rather than making it random. Other than that, though, this game is great, and for 99 cents, it's a bargain for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Ready

customer_reviews.title: Another round of Kingdom Rush
customer_reviews.text: Another round of Kingdom Rush to thirst my quench for tower defense games. This is the third installment of the series. Steadily through the series there have been improvements. This installment continues and furthers the improvements. This is the most challenging version yet for the strategy veterans.
customer_reviews.author: Sharp family

customer_reviews.title: More of the same...in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: More of the same...and that is a great thing. If you are hoping for a major twist then you may be a little disapointed. Towers look different, but are the same as those in the other games from this series. I myself am fine with that as it is the best game of this type available.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Rich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent graphics, varied game play
customer_reviews.text: Ironhide has produced the poster child of mobile platform tower defense games. It's the benchmark I now hold all other TD games to. Excellent graphics, varied game play, perfect difficulty options for those of us that wish to have more challenging games. I only wish they'd pump out new versions every 6 months. I'd buy them all.
customer_reviews.author: Potentially You

customer_reviews.title: Kingdom Rush Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This game is awesome and my favorite so far. My girlfriend gets mad at me sometimes cuz i play it so much lol. Only 1 flaw and 1 request. Every time im in the middle of the level i may get a phone call and have to leave the screen to answer or text someone, when i do that and try to return back to the game, it restarts the entire game and i have to start over. Only request is that i can purchase power ups during game play with gems. But i guess the game would be too easy then lol. Thanks for a great game guys!
customer_reviews.author: Jourdan

customer_reviews.title: and loved it. This expands nicely and does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Fairly challenging. I originally played the first Kingdom Rush, and loved it. This expands nicely and does not disappoint. Even though there is IAP, I like the fact that these guys create well polished premium games that don't require IAP to play, or require IAP to have a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great tower game!  Another great hit from Kingdom Rush!
customer_reviews.text: Another win by Ironhide Kingdom Rush games. Love these games, and have my husband and 10 year old daughter hooked. Kingdom Rush is one of the best tower games out there!
customer_reviews.author: brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: An awesome and well designed experience
customer_reviews.text: The entire kingdom rush series is excellent, and this prequel to the other two games is probably the best. It's well balanced and creative, and I've had a lot of fun experiences with this game. I suggest you also get the other games (Kingdom Rush and Kingdom Rush Frontiers) since they're cheaper and just as fun, but I wouldn't want you to miss out on the experience.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Fun strategy game.
customer_reviews.text: The Kingdom Rush series has been a long standing favorite of mine. I like the interaction in some maps and even the characters with their sayings. This third installment I enjoyed as much as the first 2. Each game gives each unit type a different polish and feel, which is fun in my opinion. Great game, can't wait for the next installment.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGuy

customer_reviews.title: Origins is my personal favorite of the Kingdom Rush franchise
customer_reviews.text: Origins is my personal favorite of the Kingdom Rush franchise. It expands on the familiar fantasy elements introduced in the original game, but feels unique.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, one noticeable bug
customer_reviews.text: Really fun game today can definitely be challenging, however if you play the game for longer than 20 minutes, the kindle fire HDX does not let you quit the game without first clicking on the "more games" button on the home screen for the game. Swiping from all sides of the screen does not work to exit from the game
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Another great one
customer_reviews.text: Third in the series of defending the kingdom. Definitely recommended for anyone who has played the previous games. This game has new tier 4 upgrades yet again which is not abnormal for Ironhide Games. As of now I haven't beaten the game, but it's a blast thus far, that's a 4 stars. The last star is lacking because once you beat the game there's not a whole lot left.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Best td series ever!
customer_reviews.text: This game, like their last two, is awesome! Once you think your getting the hang of it something unexpecting shows up which makes the game so addicting to play. Love using the hero and discovering all the upgrades. This game is very interesting and packed with content.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sequel that adds plenty of new stuff while remaining ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sequel that adds plenty of new stuff while remaining true to it's predecessors. I wish there was a PC version of it, but for handhelds, it's one of the most fun tower defense apps.
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: nice game, crashes too often
customer_reviews.text: Like so many others, I like the game a lot. The problem is, it very often crashes seconds after starting up. Initially it did it every now and then, now it does it all the time. Restarting my kindle fire has not effect. I hope they release some update soon that addresses the issue...
customer_reviews.author: Gzspiff

customer_reviews.title: A great game!
customer_reviews.text: These Kingdom Rush games are ridiculously addicting. Origins follows the same pattern as the other games in the series, so suffice it to say that Origins is worth the purchase. Don't think I would have bought it if I didn't have promotional money from amazon though.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: awesome....again!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a kingdom rush fan since the game was added on armorgames.com it was fantastic already the best tower defence game I had played but now that the mobile versions have been made and two new games to boot one with countless awards including best game in the app store award.
customer_reviews.author: zackN13

customer_reviews.title: Did not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Original was great, frontier improved upon the original, this one took it another notch in terms of new mechanics. Totally worth more than $1.
customer_reviews.author: Yanan M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and tough
customer_reviews.text: Another amazing game in an already amazing series of games, Origins brings a (possible) close to the series of Kingdom Rush games, giving an interesting backstory to several characters seen in the orginal and sequel games. Would definitely recommend this truly tough but super fun TD game.
customer_reviews.author: Kodi Fratzke.

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to spend some coins
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice game and very enjoyable but it gets pretty hard unless you are willing to invest some money in it. Still, it can bring lots of fun for many hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Dario Hiciano

customer_reviews.title: Love the gameplay
customer_reviews.text: Love the gameplay, the sound effects, design, art, and quality. The only con I think is I wish I can zoom out a bit more and sometimes the game crashes. (Luckily it doesn't do it all the time..)
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST KINGDOM RUSH GAME EVER
customer_reviews.text: First, this game is AWESOMENESS. I love how you get awesome heroes at the start of the game and you can buy heroes later if you want to. Second, the gameplay is amazing and so are the graphics. So I recommend this game for anyone😁.
customer_reviews.author: whaaaaaaaaat?

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I played the other Kingdom Rush games and got to the point where they were too easy. Love the challenge!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Game.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Kingdom Rush series of tower defense games. Never disappointing. Always fun.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: If you like tower defense style games, you simply can't go wrong with this game. Excellent game play with lots of options on how to handle various maps.
customer_reviews.author: Brett O.

customer_reviews.title: Not As Good As Frontiers
customer_reviews.text: Good game, but not as good as Kingdom Rush Frontiers. Currently, Frontiers is free, so I would recommend playing that one over Orgins. However, Orgins is still a good game that is I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The kingdom rush series are the best tower defense games out there, and this third installment is just as good as the first two. Definitely worth the download if you're a tower defense fan, or even if you're new to the genre!
customer_reviews.author: The Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Best tower defense game
customer_reviews.text: I have searched high and low for a tower defense game like this one. Great graphics, fun hidden Easter eggs, and a perfect combination of fun and challenge. Highly recommend this game to any tower defense lover.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Corish

customer_reviews.title: td gamer
customer_reviews.text: Great td game with a little rpg thrown in. I think tower raiders is still #1 but this is a close 2 nd. Although i did not buy any of the upgrade characters so i might be missing something.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fun game for even a grandma like me. Easy to understand and play.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian L. Alkire

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAME!
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of all of the kingdom rush games. This one is in my opinion a little more of a challenge then the other two. But it's one of the best, for any strategy game fan I highly recommend getting this game.
customer_reviews.author: David William Collins

customer_reviews.title: I had a lot of fun with this game and was able to beat the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of fun with this game and was able to beat the campaign in a day or two, completely leveling my archer. I look forward to updates. Maybe they'll add more levels and raise the cap or give me a reason to purchase one of the other heroes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Elia

customer_reviews.title: good time waster
customer_reviews.text: Will be playing for awhile. Challenging and fun. Xxxxxc cxxxxxx cxxxxxx cxxxxxx for fight tree brightNess throws. Dam twenty word requirements. Y
customer_reviews.author: charles c cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fun, but too short! How hard would it have been to just make a ton of levels?
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Scott

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great game having tons of fun with it I gave it four stars because you have to spend real cash later in the game that is the only thing that I don't care for in games I will just read more onto the next game I buy other then that great game
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love all kingdom rush games
customer_reviews.text: I love all kingdom rush games. Like all of them, I cannot put them down once I start. I wish more defense games were this good. Worth the price =).
customer_reviews.author: missluna

customer_reviews.title: A worth game of the title best tower defense
customer_reviews.text: This game is the third one in the series and it sure lives up to the name it has the improved hero system from the second game and Alot of environmental challenges and blessings. This game hero system you can buy special heroes from 1.99 up to 6.99$ so they can be pricey but the original three heroes are free and extremely good. Now its time for me to go back to playing the game FOR THE QUEEN!
customer_reviews.author: American

customer_reviews.title: Solid Tower Defence
customer_reviews.text: Great time killer, doesn't allow background music (spotty in my case) which I thought was odd. Gamep!ay structure is nice and the player is given much room for adaptability and playsyle. If you can't beat missions, which can be bothersome without diligence, you can always farm earlier missions for hero levels of gems for consumables. But something always felt off about kingdom rush, idk if I'm just had with Tower Defense games of something but I could never get comfortable with the difficulty. And some of the iron and/or hardcore missions felt impossible.I Despite that I enjoyed all three Kingdom Rush games and spent quite a few mindless hours beating them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kyle Holt

customer_reviews.title: fun app
customer_reviews.text: Took a few plays to figure out what to upgrade tower wise. Still not clear how best to use hero purchases from the gem store. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: J. Larson

customer_reviews.title: fun way to kill time
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, can keep you occupied for hours if you aren't careful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tablet series
customer_reviews.text: Great tower defense game with a pleasant to look at art style and nice animations. Like the other entries in this series the gameplay is solid, challenging and enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Great game on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Great TD game another success from the Kingdom Rush series.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on this game and it turned out to be really fun and addicting. Worth a shot for strategy lovers
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: great game!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY GOOD GAME. ENJOY THE LEVELS AND ENEMIES. Has a nice pace and upgrade and leveling system. Not to fond of all the main heroes though.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: WHEN IS THE NEXT KINGDOM RUSH
customer_reviews.text: I love this game but I need to know WHEN IS THE NEXT KINGDOM RUSH
customer_reviews.author: FLEx

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy playing it as well
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son loves this game. I enjoy playing it as well. I like that there is a lot of strategy involved - not just killing things.
customer_reviews.author: E. Reis

customer_reviews.title: best of the best
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game to entertain yourself but still involves lots of strategy. This is the third one of the series and is the best o the best. I have almost beaten the game and say that I had a great gaming experience. Definitely a game everyone should get!!!!!!!!!!! #KingdomRushOrigins
customer_reviews.author: Crystalynn L. Mellor

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: A pretty well designed game. However, there are some balance issues the designers could "tweek" to make it better

customer_reviews.title: This is the best! Love these type of games
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! Love these type of games! they can be hard but you just have to keep going and you will get through it.

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it I would say its not a wast of your time I like the teters it's really a good game it sometimes it is really hard I got threw it I'm on level 59

customer_reviews.text: Very creative story and smooth gameplay. And Even more balanced than it's counterparts. This time the troops play an even bigger role to the gameplay

customer_reviews.title: strategy game
customer_reviews.text: It is quite fun and challenging. A good strategy game.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: If you like Tower Defense or enjoyed the first Kingdom Rush, this game does not disappoint!

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was played this game before in the browser the first time it was release and I love it, now for my Kindle it's great. Guarantees a loot of fun just a warning, you can become addicted to this game
customer_reviews.author: Luis Monge Arias

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A competent Tower Defense game that is challenging enough to keep you entertained for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent time waster!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game, it's simple yet somewhat deep. Crazy addictive! Not forced to buy dlc to play and be competitive either which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Buchwald

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STAR RATING
customer_reviews.text: I just love tower defense games action,strategy,and thought. I love how we're you put one tower will make great impact or a bad impact on your strategy.

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. I like all of the kingdom rush games. Good take on the tower defense genre.
customer_reviews.author: oobatz17

customer_reviews.title: Get It
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy and cheap way to pass the time. Fun for the kids. My oldest is now competing with me to see who is better.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Dubuisson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun addition to the series; if you liked Kingdom Rush, Origins will be a very pleasant prequel.
customer_reviews.author: Jabberwocky

customer_reviews.title: addicting
customer_reviews.text: My son downloaded this game and I decided to try it out when I was bored one day. Now I can't stop playing!
customer_reviews.author: Timbo9154

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Kingdom Rush Game
customer_reviews.text: Great tower defense game with the added feature of heroes that level up as you play. I've played all 3 of the Kingdom Rush series and they are all really good (especially for the price). I really like that you do not need to buy the in-app purchases (additional heroes) to enjoy the game. The only issue I have is the game sometimes freezes when loading. But, it never happens during a actual play time. And, it's not a big enough deal to even deduct a star. Also, if you enjoy this series I recommend Sentinel 4 which is free via Underground.
customer_reviews.author: Optimistic

customer_reviews.title: Good challenge for vets
customer_reviews.text: I always come back to tower defense once a year. This game is actually challenging on normal if you're going for perfects. Glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Another awesome entry in the KR world!
customer_reviews.text: Great game! On par with the previous KR games. Would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: John H Mericle

customer_reviews.title: no big rush
customer_reviews.text: There are a few bugs still w/ the kindle fire 6. Very good game, glad they made another. Even happier the price was reduced.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: good tower defense
customer_reviews.text: A good tower defense game. If you played either of the other kingdom rush games you'll be sure to like this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changes were made
customer_reviews.text: I love how they changed everything since the last kingdom rush. The story, the troops, they even changed the king and made it a Queen. This game deserves 9.99$ from my pocket

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I would of liked the whole game for 5 dollars. Instead I had too guess which hero looked good and pay another 5 dollars. 10 dollars total and I don't have everything. Still a lot of fun. Would like more for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Torres

customer_reviews.title: Just as solid as the first 2
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game, easily the best tower defense game on android.

customer_reviews.text: Compatibility issues! I can't play it on my nexus 10 although its playable on Google play!!

customer_reviews.title: All around (sometimes a bit enraging) fun.
customer_reviews.text: This game is just generally enjoyable. There are some rage incudcing moments but nothing out of hand. 9.6/10.

customer_reviews.title: Kingdom Rush Series is the Best
customer_reviews.text: These games provide so many hours of fun. Totally repayable.

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing it certainly keeps you playing. And the hero system is absolutely great although I really wish there were more heroes to get.

customer_reviews.title: Good times.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fun game,and I got it for 99 cents. :D

customer_reviews.text: Awesome tower defense. Love it as much, maybe more than the others in the series.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun tower defense game, but I'm stuck at one point and can't get past the level.
customer_reviews.author: irma

customer_reviews.title: Honest
customer_reviews.text: Loved the previous games and origins is no different except there is a issue with crashing a few seconds after startup but it only happens every once and a while...

customer_reviews.title: A fun game worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A fun game with hours of entertainment. Worth the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great game.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great game. Just wish it would work on PC also.
customer_reviews.author: Super Fresh Dealz

customer_reviews.title: The best tower defense series
customer_reviews.text: Kingdom Rush is the best tower defense series out there and this is the third in that series.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Drury

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Challenging
customer_reviews.text: My go-to I-have-five-minutes game. Fun animation. Clever characters and game play. Can't wait for deck team to roll out advanced levels.
customer_reviews.author: D Dunston

customer_reviews.title: power gaming
customer_reviews.text: this game is amazing beats the first 2 so much it has so much strategy that i love and is hard to a good point it also has some fun levels to add some difference other games fail to offer
customer_reviews.author: Francis Marion

customer_reviews.title: best ever :3
customer_reviews.text: I love it I beat the game so I play the endless and I got to wave 46 :O believe to get that achieve it I what to play it now. Let's put a smile on that FACE!!!!! :3
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: great game, exactly what i want in tower defense
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect tower defense game! I looked for a while but had trouble finding one like this and couldn't be more pleased with the find.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Norm

customer_reviews.title: There's no rush like a kingdom rush
customer_reviews.text: This game gives many hours of fun and I am glad they keep it coming!
